fields.title: //a[contains(@class, 'catalog-form__link') and contains(@class, 'catalog-form__link_nodecor') and contains(@class, 'catalog-form__link_primary') and contains(@class, 'catalog-form__link_base') and (contains(text(), 'ноутбук') or contains(text(), 'Ноутбук') or contains(text(), 'станция'))]/text()
fields.link: //a[contains(@class, 'catalog-form__link') and contains(@class, 'catalog-form__link_nodecor') and contains(@class, 'catalog-form__link_primary') and contains(@class, 'catalog-form__link_base') and (contains(text(), 'ноутбук') or contains(text(), 'Ноутбук') or contains(text(), 'станция'))]/@href
